name: The Experience
description:
This game is a tryout to pratice the RTS style games in Ludum Dare 45.

TIPS :

  • Sacrifice a guy at the base of the spine to create a flag
  • Once a flag is created you can move the camera on the edges to explore
  • Try to click on everything
  • The red guys are made for fight the chickens
  • The blue guys are made to carry the hammer and cave
  • The yellow guys are made to build
  • You have to sacrifice about 3 to 5 yellow guys to build a building (click again on the construction to finish)
  • The buildings spawn passively units
  • You have to bringt the cave back to the base to end the game
